body:
Just tried this on linux. Linux build time is ok.
For example (in a docker container):
real	0m1.459s
user	0m1.180s
sys	0m0.340s

This is output of a build with added -ldflags="-v=2" on OS X:

````
~/work/web/src/golang/src/slow_build>time  go build -ldflags="-v=2"
````
